name: Michigan
blurb: Has anyone seen the front half of the conference schedule for Michigan? In the first 4 games, they get 3 of the teams at the bottom of my power rankings.

name: Purdue
blurb: Gargantuan tilt against Iowa State coming up. Is this the most anticipated non-conference game at Mackey in the last 20 years?

name: Michigan State
blurb: If you are the second best player on your team against Michigan State, you better show up because they are going to take away your best guy.

name: Illinois
blurb: This team doesn't really have an identity and that's concerning. Don't really defend that well, don't shoot well and the rebounding the past two weeks has been suspect.

name: Wisconsin
blurb: I'm upset that Illinois never recruited John Blackwell.

name: Iowa
blurb: The game against MSU was alarming because someone aside from Bennett Stirtz needs to be dependable and that someone doesn't exist right now. Once they figure it out, this team should be fine.

name: Indiana
blurb: Indiana isn't so good that Tucker DeVries can disappear in conference games.

name: Nebraska
blurb: Pryce Sandfort has been a pleasant surprise.

name: UCLA
blurb: Bit concerning that Mick Cronin had to bench four starters to send a message. This is the one of the oldest teams in the sport...

name: Washington
blurb: Moving this team down for the sole reason that their non-conference schedule is a joke. Being off for 9 days in mid-November makes no sense.

name: USC
blurb: Won the Great Value Maui Invitational but don't think this team has the horses to survive in conference play.

name: Minnesota
blurb: Showed a lot of toughness against Indiana. This will probably be a team that struggles on the road but is really good at home.

name: Northwestern
blurb: Another one of those teams that will probably be tougher to play against when they are at home.

name: Ohio State
blurb: Looked very unimpressive in a close win over Notre Dame. Just not seeing the vision this year for this team.

name: Oregon
blurb: Nate Bittle is now hurt. Better get the injuries fully out of the way now before the conference season gets into full swing.

name: Maryland
blurb: Played a tough schedule in Vegas but the defense just got obliterated. Going to be a long year.

name: Penn State
blurb: Big fan of Kayden Mingo but that's about it.

name: Rutgers
blurb: Not surprising but a brutal showing in Vegas. I don't see how Pikiell survives this season with his job.
